name: Lhasa Limited
membership:
Pistoia Alliance https://www.pistoiaalliance.org/
Royal Society of Chemistry http://www.rsc.org/
goal:
Lhasa Limited is a not-for-profit organisation and educational charity that specialises in the development of expert computer systems for toxicity, metabolism and degradation prediction. Lhasa Limited also facilitates collaborative data sharing projects in the pharmaceutical,
cosmetics and chemistry-related industries in order to support the development and validation of it's expert systems.
interests: Education and training, Food Safety, Public Health, Research and innovation
euInitiatives: Reach, Pharmaceutical regulations, e.g. ICH M7, Q3D, Q3A, Q3B etc, Cosmetics Legislation
